PSCT.Vegas:
① This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. 
Ⓒ While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.
● You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Hieratic" monster (except "Hieratic Seal of the Dragon King") 
from your hand/Deck/GY, in face-up Defense Position.
